See Procedure Names
Note:
  -guidance @
    -https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/show-procedures.html
Main Success Scenario:
  1. SHOW PROCEDURES;
  2. End 
Alternatives:
  1a. Show all procedures for the "MyDB" database
    1a1. SHOW PROCEDURES in DATABASE MyDB;
    1a2. Go to step 2
  1b. Show all procedures for the "MySchema" schema
    1b1. SHOW PROCEDURES in SCHEMA MySchema;
    1b2. go to step 2
